author: Keris Lahiff
title: After Dow's best day since 1933, $15 billion fund manager urges caution
description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average just had its best day since 1933. David Spika of GuideStone Capital says it's too early to get too optimistic.
content:
Stimulus hopes on Tuesday gave U.S. stock markets a shot of adrenaline. 
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rallied more than 11%, its best daily percentage gain since March 1933. The S&P 500 climbed 9%.
